name: Save Pandas
description: Panda game is a carton styled shooter with baby pandas and red monstros in a beautiful BURNING forest. That's right the main scene is on fire and pandas are in danger. The main mission is to save pandas and teleport them to another world free of monstros. You'll have timer for every level, they will be three . Try to reach the target for every level and save as many pandas as you can. Use your oculus touch controllers to grab pandas and to shoot the monstros. Also you will have 2 types of guns, cool ones. That's all folks, good luck in your mission soldier of panda's peace !
